block.p: NUCO2 INC., Stuart, Fla., which supplies carbon dioxide systems for use in fountian beverages, agreed to buy the carbon dioxide supply operation of Coca-Cola Bottling Co. of New York Inc. Terms were not disclosed.

NUCO2 INC., Stuart, Fla., which supplies carbon dioxide systems for use in fountian beverages, agreed to buy the carbon dioxide supply operation of Coca-Cola Bottling Co. of New York Inc. Terms were not disclosed.
PHOENIX SHANNON P.L.C., Shannon, Ireland, a maker of dental products, plans to acquire Excelco International Inc. of Deerfield Beach, Fla., a maker of dental ceramic, for an undisclosed amount.

GTE CORP., Stamford, Conn., a telecommunication holding company, said it would invest $28 million in a joint venture with Guangzhou Guangtong Resources Co., to support the development of wireless telecomunications in China.
